Name: LIFTOPIA one more!
About the game: The big adventure of a square creature! It is a somewhat nostalgic action game drawn with dots. The main character, Lifton, doesn't say anything, but he seems to be heading somewhere. Lifton will capture a variety of stages with the help of the enemies around him (while using them). The feature of this game is to 'lift' the enemy. Enemies picked up by Lifton can be thrown, thrown away, or whatever. By the way, some enemies have some effect while increasing or decreasing.
